name: Movies You SHOULD Have Seen! Quiz | Movies Grab Bag | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the yellow sports car that Nicolas Cage 'borrows' in the movie 'The Rock'?
questions.explanation:
Ferrari.

	It is a Ferrari 350 Spyder. Real Hot Car!

questions.text: In 'Star Wars', what is Darth Vader's name as a young man?
questions.explanation:
Anakin Skywalker.

	Anakin Skywalker grows up to kill nearly all of the jedi once he turns to the Dark Side of the force and becomes Vader as a result from a fight with Obi Wan Kenobi.

questions.text: In the movie 'Clash of the Titans', who is the hero that kills medusa, the 3-headed dog, and the evil sea monster?
questions.explanation:
Perseus.

	Perseus is correct. He is the greatest Greek hero of all time. Too bad I'm not Greek.

questions.text: What is John Malkovich's name in the movie 'Con Air'?
In the movie 'The Longest Yard' starring Burt Reynolds, what is the name of the teams? (Hint: Both teams are named the same thing) ?
questions.explanation:
Mean Machine.

	The inmates stole the guards 'Away' jerseys and used them. This is why both teams were called mean machine.

questions.text: What is the title of the 1999 documentary about professional wrestlers?
questions.explanation:
Beyond the Mat.

	This movie came out in March 2000.

questions.text: The movie 'The Shining' starring Jack Nicholson, has something written on the wall, that spells something else backwards. What is it?
questions.explanation:
redrum.

	Redrum, when looked at through a mirror, spells 'murder' -spooky.

questions.text: In 'Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas', what is the drug that the two co-stars do by sniffing an American flag? (Hint. This flag was doused in this liquid, and they sniffed it) ?
questions.explanation:
Ether.

	This was one of the 3 best movies of all time!
